inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Shortbow', 'Damage', 15); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Longbow', 'Damage', 15); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Advanced Training, Bows
description: You gain an additional +15 to damage with shortbows and longbows.
